sentences.sContent: The water in the tank is constantly filtered.
sentences.sCn: 鱼缸里的水在不停地被过滤。

sentences.sContent: The ozone layer filters harmful UV rays from the sun.
sentences.sCn: 臭氧层过滤掉有害的太阳紫外线。

sentences.sContent: ...This ability seems to carry with it certain cultural assumptions — that everything that can be measured should be measured; that data is a transparent and reliable lens that allows us to filter out emotionalism and ideology; that data will help us do remarkable things — like foretell the future...
...This scenario is common in newsrooms that lack a systematic way to filter story suggestions...

synos.tran: [电子][光]滤波器；[轻][核][化工]过滤器；筛选；滤光器
[轻][核][化工]过滤；渗透；用过滤法除去

trans.tranOther: to remove unwanted substances from water, air etc by passing it through a special substance or piece of equipment
